title: Person of Interest Series Finale: The Team Gathers
author: IGN
comment: Tears were shed when John died, a hero.
I think this is going to continue.. Remember when we meet the other three characters in the previous episodes. I think they will carry it on with them, hopefully 👍💯
I like how nobody knows about this show and it's annoying
description:
Finch (Michael Emerson) and Reese (Jim Caviezel) bring Fusco (Kevin Chapman) to Shaw (Sarah Shahi) and the Machine, as the team assembles -- for the final time? -- in this scene from Person of Interest's final episode, airing June 21st.
